item.name: Laser-Engraved Wood Box with Custom Etched Wine
item.description: For an elegant gifting solution, consider this wine gift set, featuring your choice of wine with a deep-etched bottle, hand-painted with a 1-color fill (additional colors available for an extra charge). Accompanied by two custom-etched stemless wine glasses, this set is presented in a slide-top rustic wood box, laser-engraved with your message or company logo. Nestled in excelsior wood shavings, it makes an impressive holiday or thank you gift for clients and friends. Options for upgrading to name brand wine, French champagne, wax-dipped bottles, or custom die-cut hang tags or card inserts are available. Ideal for executive gifts, this set combines sophistication and thoughtful customization.
item.description_short: Wine gift set with a bottle, two stemless wine glasses, and a slide-top wood box.

item.name: Laser-Engraved Wood Box with Custom Etched Wines
item.description: Express your gratitude to your team by gifting them this tasteful wine gift set. Included are two deep-etched and painted bottles with a 1-color fill housed inside a slide-top rustic wood box that can be laser-engraved with your company or business's logo, brand name, or message. The bottles are neatly tucked inside excelsior wood shavings. If you'd like to upgrade your order to include a name brand wine, French champagne, wax dipped bottles, or custom die-cut hang tags or card inserts, feel free to reach out. Choose between cabernet, pinot noir, chardonnay, or champagne. Make a remarkable impact and order for your next event.

item.name: Etched Cabernet Sauvignon Red Wine Bottle
item.description: Consider a distinguished gift that speaks volumes of quality and craftsmanship. This 750ml. cabernet sauvignon red wine bottle features deep hand etching and optional hand-painted color fills. With a proud 5-star rating for over 15 years, we are recognized as the highest-quality custom labeling and etching company in the industry. Each bottle is hand-crafted by artisans in our California facility, perfect for custom etching corporate logos and personalized text. Ideal for weddings, retirement celebrations, holidays, thank-you, or executive gifts. We carry all widely available name brand wines. See ordering guidelines for protective packaging pricing that will apply.

Each bottle is deep etched and hand-painted, including one color fill, making it the perfect corporate gift.

item.name: Etched Jordan Cabernet Alexander Valley Red Wine Bottle
item.description: Embark on a sensory journey with this unforgettable 750ml Jordan Alexander cabernet bottle, a wine that captivates with its intricate and vibrant scent of red plum, anise, cherry, violets, and tobacco, enriched by black currant, dried herbs, toasted oak, and cocoa. Upon tasting it, your palate is graced with an elegant and supple texture, revealing generous flavors of sweet plum and dark cherry, accented by vanilla and mocha. Silky tannins and a harmonious structure linger in the finish. This bottle, deep hand-etched and hand-painted with one color fill, is perfect for holidays, thank-you, or executive gifts. Many made in the USA products available! We carry all widely available name brand wines.

item.name: Laser-Engraved Wood Box w/Custom Etched Chardonnay Wine
item.description: Express your gratitude with an elegant corporate gift. This wine gift set features a 750ml. bottle of chardonnay wine, deep-etched and hand-painted with a 1-color fill (additional colors available for an extra charge), and two custom-etched stemless wine glasses. Encased in a slide-top rustic wood box, laser-engraved with your company logo or message, the bottle and glassware are housed in excelsior wood shavings to perfect the presentation. We offer options to upgrade to a name brand wine or French champagne, and add custom die-cut hang tags or card inserts. Celebrate your recipients in style and order today.
